content: completed in next v-st *shell in next v-st v-st in center double_crochet of next 3-double_crochet group shell in next v-st repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 12 shells 6 v-sts round 7 slip_stitch to first chain-1 space of shell chain 6 double_crochet in same st beginning v-st completed shell in next v-st v-st in center of next shell *v-st in center of next shell shell in next v-st v-st in center of next shell repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 6 shells 12 v-sts round 8 slip_stitch in space of first v-st chain 3 1 double_crochet in same space chain 1 2 double_crochet in same space beg shell completed v-st in center of next shell shell in next v-st *shell in next v-st v st in center of next shell shell in next v-st repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 12 shells 6 v-sts repeat rnds 7 & 8 twice more 12 rounds total next round work this round loosely to allow for stretch chain 1 work 4 single_crochet over ea shell and 3 single_crochet in space of ea v-st around join with slip_stitch 66 single_crochet edging round work this round loosely to allow for stretch work reverse single_crochet in ea single_crochet around working from left to right around cap join with slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
